hero.hero_1: Looking for a job abroad? Our team of experts provides you with a secure job, accommodation, stimulating income and opportunities for progress and further training.
hero.hero_2: We offer you efficient and professional employment of all staff, from highly educated to employees with secondary education.
hero.hero_3: We are an agency that offers many opportunities. Contact us with confidence and achieve new business successes!

Cjelokupnu podršku tijekom boravka izvan: Support during your stay outside your home country.
Tražite li novi izazov u Europi i želite: Looking for a new challenge in Europe and want professional support from the very beginning
Od prvog razgovora do uspješnog zaposlen: From the first interview to successful employment and living abroad, our experts will provide you with comprehensive support which includes
Obratite nam se da zajedno realiziramo V: Contact us to realize your dream journey together
Pozivamo Vas da usavršite svoju stručnos: We invite you to hone your expertise in a new stimulating work environment
Zdravstvenim djelatnicima nudimo rad u p: We offer healthcare professionals work in prestigious clinics, hospitals and other institutions in Europe. We provide a secure job, which is accompanied by an excellent income, a favorable work environment and numerous opportunities for advancement
Nudimo mogućnost zaposlenja u privatnim: We offer the possibility of employment in private and state homes where people who need personal care in everyday life are accommodated
Pružite svoju stručnu pomoć starim, nemo: Provide your professional assistance to the elderly, infirm and disabled in a work environment that provides you with a stimulating income and a pleasant working atmosphere
Nudimo Vam učinkovite odgovore i rješenj: We offer you effective answers and solutions for all personnel issues and personnel management, Thanks to our expertise in the medical and care sector, we are pioneers in our industry
Zahvaljujući sofisticiranim mrežama u ci: Thanks to sophisticated networks across Europe, our database currently contains over 60,000 relevant health sector applicant profiles, which can be used flexibly and are immediately available
Uz Certifikat Licence, mi smo prvi i za: With the License Certificate, we are the first and for now the only employment agency in Croatia with an official agency license
Svim kadrovima, od visoko obrazovanih do: We provide safe and adequate employment abroad to all staff, from the highly educated to the employees with secondary education. Present your expertise and potential to us, and we will offer you the most desirable and attractive jobs
text_1: We started our business journey in 2003 in Germany. That year, the employment agency BS Benli was established, whose main task is to provide assistance in finding skilled workers and mediation in employment in the profession. During its many years of operation, the agency has established eighteen partnerships in seven different German states. Relying on our own professionalism and many years of work, we have accepted the challenge of becoming a leading agency in the field of employment of health and other professionals in Europe over the next few years. To achieve this goal together, we brought together a team of experts in the fields of finance, law, economics, philosophy and psychology to form MMC Group d.o.o. in Croatia.
text_2: MMC Group d.o.o., full name Medical Management Croatia Group, an agency that offers temporary employment and employment mediation, we founded on August 6, 2020 in Vukovar. By founding an agency in Croatia, we have completed our dream of international connection and cooperation. Our agency is currently the only employment agency in Croatia that has a License Certificate, or an official agency license. By providing employment opportunities abroad, our goal is to give Croatian and other experts full support in gaining new experiences and steps towards their own progress. Through persistent work, commitment and counseling, we want to be a support in the realization of dreams.
MMC Group d.o.o. je tu za Vas: MMC Group d.o.o. is here for You
Obratite nam se s povjerenjem kako bi Va: Contact us to help you find your dream job
Kontaktirajte nas i doznajte sve detalje: Contact us and find out all the details
Na ponuđenom linku dostupan je Obrazac z: The Application Form is available at the link provided, which can be downloaded to your device by clicking on the blue button. Send the completed form, together with your CV, to our e-mail address
Za sva pitanja kontaktirajte nas, od pon: For all questions contact us, from Monday to Friday during working hours (8AM - 4PM) at
comment_1: The team delighted me with their kindness and friendliness. Recommended!
comment_2: I am grateful to MMC GROUP d.o.o., which with its professionalism and responsibility helped me get a great job abroad and a happy, dignified life.
comment_3: The agency offers a wide range of possibilities and with its help I finally found accommodation and a permanent job in Germany, with which I am more than satisfied.
comment_4: Due to the fact that the whole team is working hard to answer all your questions and advise you on the best choice of job, I would recommend the agency to all those who are still hesitant about going abroad!
comment_5: Quick and easy employment with great support!
